name: Slider Ball
description: In Slider Ball, you control a hero who must continuously deal with the attacks of the malicious blaster beast. The beast fires fire balls which you must dodge to avoid damage, as well as a novel kind of ball known as a posi ball, which you must catch. As it is an endless game, you cannot defeat the beast, but rather your goal is to survive and get a high score. For more information on the gameplay, there is a help screen that can be accessed through the settings menu.
